listitem.para: Clears the entire text mode screen and resets the cursor to (0,0).
Prints the system memory map provided by the Multiboot bootloader.
Enables the text mode cursor and sets its shape.
A custom implementation of the standard printf function for writing to VGA text mode memory.
Updates the position of the text mode cursor.

enable_cursor() enable_cursorbasic basicenable_cursor
void basic::enable_cursor (uint8_t cursor_start, uint8_t cursor_end)
Enables the text mode cursor and sets its shape.
Parameters
cursor_start
The starting scanline for the cursor block.
cursor_end
The ending scanline for the cursor block.
